name: chaos vault
description:
Turn based bullet hell.

Survive!
Dodge bullets and avoid traps in this complex mind-bending game!

You can move by clicking a piece and moving it next to another.

Your pieces are the solid colored ones.

If you touch a piece, you gain control of it.

If you lose a piece and remain with less than two pieces, you die and restart immediately.

If you find it tedious clicking to select pieces, use the number keys to select them.

Source code: https://github.com/jacopograndi/ld50
